title: Smurf
body: So, on my other account I had a very stupid name, which is why I made this new account. The problem is; on my other account I had a few skins and ward skins, and it would be a waste of money if I just let them be on my alt. I can show you evidence of me logging onto that account, confirm it's mine and show you the skins. Unless there is a way to merge my accounts ( so I get the levels, Icons, loot, etc. ) I would love to get the skins moved to my new account.

replies.body: We can't merge or move content between two accounts. If you just didn't like the Summoner name of the first account, I'd suggest buying a name change to get that switched!
